Package org.apache.catalina.mbeans

Class MBeanUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.mbeans.MBeanUtils
  • public class MBeanUtils
extends Object
    Public utility methods in support of the server side MBeans implementation.
    Author:
    Craig R. McClanahan, Amy Roh
